about_the_game:
You play as 9-year-old Barney Bubbs, a runaway orphan forced to seek shelter in a shed during a nasty thunderstorm. In doing so, Barney unexpectedly finds himself trapped in a pocket dimension called the "Fun Depot" with quirky sphere-headed beings. Thankfully, though, Barney has nothing to worry about! After all, these Circleheads just want to have FUNFUNFUNFUNFUNFUNFUNFUNFUNFUNFUNFUN!

  • THIS GAME CONTAINS FLASHING LIGHTS, DISTURBING IMAGERY, AND LOUD NOISES!

You are forced to spend one long night in the Fun Depot with the Circleheads. Look on your tablet to keep tabs on them as well as the many childhood-come-to-life rooms that they inhabit. Use your lasers and lights to check outside your room and keep any unwanted pests out. Make the call: trust the Circleheads, or think twice? Either way, you’ll be in for a FUNFUNFUNFUN time!

During your experience at the Fun Depot you’ll become well acquainted with the Circleheads: Greg (the giggly leader), Benjy (the bigoted weirdo), Carol (the alcoholic sweetheart), Fabio (the hermit clown), and Henry (the narcoleptic handyman). Are they on the level, or is there more to them than meets the eye…?

CONTROLS: As long as you’ve got a functioning mouse and keyboard, you’re golden! Keep your middle mouse button handy!

A point-and-click survival horror game made with Clickteam Fusion 2.5. My first ever completed game! Heavily inspired by Scott Cawthon.

content_descriptors.notes: Disturbing imagery/sounds. Loud, sudden jumpscares. Trypophobia (fear of holes) warning. Implied death and description of death of a minor. Crass language. Infrequent insensitive comments.
